#11 the white blalance



This last week we worked on the main settings of the camera and in how to operate it, to show so I varied the white balance to show the different tipes there are. from cold to warm.





That was during class, but during the week we had to record our shots that we specified in the story board, this will come later.

These are some photos of the proces of doing so.
